name: Zuber Service Center
description:
Zuber Service Center is a game about maintaining a taxi service, where you have to assign a passenger to the available drivers.

The passengers have an emergency meter in their profiles. Try to get all the passengers with high emergency level because they will help you to maintain the reputation of your company.

How to play

  • Go to passenger tab and select one passenger from there. The details will save in the notepad.
  • Go to the Driver tab and fill up the details of any on the available driver and press send.
  • Don't let this bar go down.
